titleInfo.title: Proceedings of the 26th Göttingen Neurobiology Conference 1998. 1: New neuroethology on the move

Zeil J, Egelhaaf M (1998)
Visual ecology and neural coding.
In: Proceedings of the 26th Göttingen Neurobiology Conference 1998. 1: New neuroethology on the move. Elsner N, Wehner R (Eds); Beiträge zur Göttinger Neurobiologentagung, 26,1. Stuttgart [u.a.]: Thieme: 347-351.
